text: the Amazon workspaces family of products

end users workspaces pools is our
non-persistent desktop option and it

console open in the Oregon region Us
West 2 for the stem

directory
button select the pool
category in the user access URL section
we'll enter a placeholder URL for the
time
being it needs to begin with https colon
SL
slash we'll skip the relay State
parameter
name for directory information enter a
friendly name it does need to be unique
and it does not need to be a fully
qualified domain name in in fact I would
recommend that it not
be for the networking and security
section uncheck the access to Internet
Box this allows you to put the
workspaces into private subnets where
they can still have internet access
through aat Gateway ornat instance ornat
Appliance but it does not assign them

for enabling bring your own license uh
Windows desktop workspaces pool setups

this is not
required in the streaming property
section you can optionally configure
clipboard permissions the default is to
allow copying and pasting in both
directions but you could set that to One
Direction or disable it and then you can

whether users are allowed to print and
whether they have home

now select the pools option
here and enter a name and description
for the

and I'm going to look for a server 2022

times application settings persistence

giving a semi-persistent experience for

article for this

here and select

Enterprise

account access
